title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Organizational Change Management - Leadership for Transforming Resistance into Learning Opportunities

context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three specific strategies to convert employee resistance in change management processes into organizational learning opportunities.
Learners can reframe team conflict situations into a learning-promoting environment using communication techniques based on sociocultural constructivist principles.
Learners can develop an action plan that utilizes resistance as a feedback mechanism in real organizational change scenarios through project-based collaboration.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
